title: Out Of Darkness
description: OUT OF DARKNESS is a showcase for a range of stories from a variety of authors. Escape from reality and plunge into a dark world where ghosts reside, the grim reaper takes form, children are taunted by witches, something dangerous lurks in a pit and more… Just remember one thing…don’t be scared of the dark, it won’t hurt you. Or will it?
author: Vanessa Wester
